name: Gunn/Jerkens Marketing Communications
description:
For over 25 years, Gunn|Jerkens has maintained a passionate commitment to everything that we do. We speak straight, deliver on promises and strive for the utmost in client satisfaction.
Looking at the world as a vibrant palette, we see the way communication blends with environment to stir reactions and provoke interaction, resulting in new ideas that move and inspire.
